original_title: Ry Cooder: How Can a Poor Man Stand Such Times and Live?
overview: An introduction to the world of Ry Cooder and his debut album on Warner Bros. Records. Cooder talks about old movies, trailers and the lay of the land. And most of all about the inspiration from Blind Alfred Reed's song "How can a poor man stand such times and live?"
title: Ry Cooder: How Can a Poor Man Stand Such Times and Live?
